channel.title: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility
channel.description:
Hey all,
A few years ago, I put together an overhead map of the mod version of Black Mesa. Said map can be found in this thread: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/16538-A-map-of-BM-s-Black-Mesa-Research-Facility/[/url]. Since the steam version has come out, I took some time to make a new version of the maps (especially now that Surface Tension has been uncut). In particular, I wanted to be a lot more thorough this time around. This more or less amounted to my viewing the maps at a much closer-up scale of 4 (the originals were done at a scale of 10, for comparison), and also making sure that each map was clean of light pollution. What exactly do I mean by that? When compiling these maps, I use the cl_leveloverview command and take screenshots of the resulting top-down views. I stitch these together in paint and then there they are. But because of how lights work, it can seem like there is stuff that isn't really there; i.e. there is material that is outside the map. If unchecked, this can block maps placed underneath it. If you look at the mod version of the maps that I made, this was actually quite prevalent.
The result is that the map is in HD! Or, at least, all of the individual maps are. Like last time, I broke it down map by map and chapter by chapter. Also, I've gone to the liberty of also including all of the deathmatch maps as well; you'll find them all huddled in the lower left corner of each picture.
I also have stock versions of these overhead maps. I have differentiated between versions via s for stock and u for uncut.
I do want to point out that some of the picture files ended up being quite large (in particular, I speak of both full overhead views plus the overhead for Surface Tension). In order to get imgur to accept these files, I used jpg format instead of png format. This has possibly resulted in a loss of quality for the latter and definitely has resulted in quality loss for the former. If enough people want it, I can put up dropbox links to the original HD png files that I worked with.
I now present the map. This version features mods which uncut Black Mesa, comprising of the following:
We've Got Hostiles!: Vent Mod by .RK
On a Rail: Loop Mod by .RK
On a Rail Uncut by TextFAMGUY1
Overhead u: [url='https://i.imgur.com/wH30iHT.jpg'][img]https://i.imgur.com/wH30iHT.jpg[/img][/url]
And, of course, a version without mods: [url='https://i.imgur.com/4sDR4lw.jpg']Overhead s[/url]
And overheads by chapter and map:
[url='https://i.imgur.com/lqjxQHu.jpg']Inbound[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/rlbXkOn.png']bm_c0a0a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/ALi5O5s.png']bm_c0a0b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/30w7Dfp.png']bm_c0a0c[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/ba5QFb2.png']Anomalous Materials[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/an2xI69.png']bm_c1a0a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/SbQDlIb.png']bm_c1a0b[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/z1JmNGQ.png']Unforeseen Consequences[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/dLQxIoq.png']bm_c1a1a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/gobcL8w.png']bm_c1a1b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/F2u9HJH.png']bm_c1a1c[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/0sgEAea.png']bm_c1a1d[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/jMGDV20.png']bm_c1a1e[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/SE6fAa5.png']Office Complex[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/0LhrCgl.png']bm_c1a2a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/TxEAJiF.png']bm_c1a2b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/PCy2MEL.png']bm_c1a2c[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/MKpJA0a.png']We've Got Hostiles s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/AHDxH7Y.png']We've Got Hostiles u[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/gNrQapt.png']bm_c1a3a s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/CufFwS1.png']bm_c1a3a u[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/jqBNK9l.png']bm_c1a3b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/rgVdkJi.png']bm_c1a3c s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/Ifetm2k.png']bm_c1a3c u[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/eGhc1lT.png']Blast Pit[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/lB9QoHJ.png']bm_c1a4a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/fzMI1rF.png']bm_c1a4b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/3U30wFo.png']bm_c1a4c[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/U6fMAl1.png']bm_c1a4d[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/Jm7O1gN.png']bm_c1a4e[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/4volMce.png']Power Up[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/jbUKGBs.png']bm_c2a1a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/Q8cEjn9.png']bm_c2a1b[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/2v8Xzqf.png']On a Rail s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/cukSvxM.jpg']On a Rail u[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/iABGKsY.png']bm_c2a2a s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/EM78vAM.png']bm_c2a2a u[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/PsJUxPY.png']bm_c2a2a1[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/89tOLR8.png']bm_c2a2a2[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/qjo18Bg.png']bm_c2a2b s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/zfRUmXi.png']bm_c2a2b u[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/McFBHZb.png']bm_c2a2b1[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/5vk7HLm.jpg']bm_c2a2b2[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/Gampfer.png']bm_c2a2c s[/url] / [url='https://i.imgur.com/dFzSbTA.png']bm_c2a2c u[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/5FiPE7L.png']Apprehension[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/XuhBnRo.png']bm_c2a3a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/HM6OwWx.png']bm_c2a3b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/y2oMcjh.png']bm_c2a3c[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/eXteNJ7.png']Residue Processing[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/QWJAaRE.png']bm_c2a4a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/NMggLxA.png']bm_c2a4b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/qUQi3ch.png']bm_c2a4c[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/B73hCMb.png']Questionable Ethics[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/uMA9WFt.png']bm_c2a4e[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/xy8iLaz.png']bm_c2a4f[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/86Jcihc.png']bm_c2a4g[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/xZAaAjE.png']bm_c2a4h[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/XbubRxt.jpg']Surface Tension[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/emC2Xv5.jpg']bm_c2a5a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/2GedxIu.png']bm_c2a5b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/VlnmOQ2.png']bm_c2a5c[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/TaEjQqC.png']bm_c2a5d[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/cZ6MaRI.png']bm_c2a5e[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/ksQev8D.png']bm_c2a5f[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/fsAQOWh.jpg']bm_c2a5g[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/Q8z8pHQ.png']bm_c2a5h[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/fgOKdvR.png']bm_c2a5i[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/X0k9tqk.png']Forget about Freeman[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/baez20x.png']bm_c3a1a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/nQ6Otuf.png']bm_c3a1b[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/KjrCODB.jpg']Lambda Core[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/aESowKw.png']bm_c3a2a[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/MuPMimf.png']bm_c3a2b[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/2Ik8BI7.png']bm_c3a2c[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/8DdvTrh.png']bm_c3a2d[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/2nbKFpY.png']bm_c3a2e[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/QhljvpE.png']bm_c3a2f[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/RRxBMGC.png']bm_c3a2g[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/sNTHQJg.png']bm_c3a2h[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/yxVmh6X.png']bm_c3a2i[/url]
[url='https://i.imgur.com/Ngn5t2E.jpg']Deathmatch[/url] = [url='https://i.imgur.com/AUNDeAw.png']dm_boom[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/aRA6EWK.png']dm_bounce[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/Qz6YC2d.png']dm_chopper[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/wiR35GA.png']dm_crossfire[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/LP05cvo.png']dm_gasworks[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/474ScgA.png']dm_lambdabunker[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/kn3lR24.png']dm_power[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/GLbhaZz.png']dm_rail[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/K6efSWr.png']dm_stack[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/DYTWhBx.png']dm_stalkyard[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/jYtRIg2.png']dm_subtransit[/url] - [url='https://i.imgur.com/qcPeotT.png']dm_undertow[/url]

item.title: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
If it’s not too much of a blatant self-promotion, I also attempted a more “interpretive” version of a Facility map that tried to minimize the number of warps and overlaps.

Read full topic

item.title: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
Ah! Apologies. Actually, I’m not on the forums to much these days (although given Xen is now out, I’m here to fix some things and do some more work-eventually). But I did get an email notification for this topic. And I realized a good solution which I feel silly for not having realized a while ago.

Dropbox

Dropbox - Link not found

Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

Read full topic

item.source: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility

item.title: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility
item.dc:creator: Ferrius
item.description:
Hey all, and @RK1 especially

I’m working with an art-student friend (as a passion project), on making an artistic topside rendition of Black Mesa. We’ve been going for a week now, gathering any and all resources we can manage as well as any artistic liberties previous renditions have undertaken - and to this, the PNG files for these amazing looking overviews, would be very highly appreciated.

I noticed it was requested previously by @NoriMori - and I’m not sure if you got a private reply, perhaps?

Regardless, your overviews are pretty top notch, compared to the quality we’ve been able to source as of yet.

BR
Ferrius

Read full topic
item.source: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility

item.title: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility
item.dc:creator: NoriMori
item.description:
Beautiful work, .RK! Thank you!

.RK:

If enough people want it, I can put up dropbox links to the original HD png files that I worked with.

Is one person enough? Haha…

Also, wondering if there’s a version of “Overhead u” that doesn’t have the deathmatch inset?

Lastly, have you ever made a version that has OaR Loop Mod, OaR Uncut, WGH Vent Mod, andSurface Tension Uncut? Your original map has Surface Tension Uncut but not Vent Mod; this one has Vent Mod but not Surface Tension Uncut. …And that’s the point where I remembered that Black Mesa retail now includes Surface Tension Uncut. Whoopsie! Well then, that means this new overhead map is everything I wanted! I had always wished the original had the WGH Vent Mod, and this version has it! WOO!

Read full topic

Can’t wait to see the Xen ones

+1 year delay on the Xen overheads

CatzEyes93:

Thanks for providing the link to the whole shebang! Are these shots not shared with the imgur community? You should let others updoot it for ya.

You should let others updoot it for ya

You hurt your what?

CPU:

I can’t imagine how long it must have taken to do this.
Looks amazing!

If it gives you an idea, I started work on the overhead maps on the 8th. So about 11 days of work went into making these overheads.

item.title: [Steam release version] A map of BM's Black Mesa Research Facility
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
Hey all,

A few years ago, I put together an overhead map of the mod version of Black Mesa. Said map can be found in this thread: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/16538-A-map-of-BM-s-Black-Mesa-Research-Facility/. Since the steam version has come out, I took some time to make a new version of the maps (especially now that Surface Tension has been uncut). In particular, I wanted to be a lot more thorough this time around. This more or less amounted to my viewing the maps at a much closer-up scale of 4 (the originals were done at a scale of 10, for comparison), and also making sure that each map was clean of light pollution. What exactly do I mean by that? When compiling these maps, I use the cl_leveloverview command and take screenshots of the resulting top-down views. I stitch these together in paint and then there they are. But because of how lights work, it can seem like there is stuff that isn’t really there; i.e. there is material that is outside the map. If unchecked, this can block maps placed underneath it. If you look at the mod version of the maps that I made, this was actually quite prevalent.

The result is that the map is in HD! Or, at least, all of the individual maps are. Like last time, I broke it down map by map and chapter by chapter. Also, I’ve gone to the liberty of also including all of the deathmatch maps as well; you’ll find them all huddled in the lower left corner of each picture.

I also have stock versions of these overhead maps. I have differentiated between versions via s for stock and u for uncut.

I do want to point out that some of the picture files ended up being quite large (in particular, I speak of both full overhead views plus the overhead for Surface Tension). In order to get imgur to accept these files, I used jpg format instead of png format. This has possibly resulted in a loss of quality for the latter and definitely has resulted in quality loss for the former. If enough people want it, I can put up dropbox links to the original HD png files that I worked with.

I now present the map. This version features mods which uncut Black Mesa, comprising of the following:

We’ve Got Hostiles!: Vent Mod by .RK

On a Rail: Loop Mod by .RK

On a Rail Uncut by TextFAMGUY1

Overhead u:

And, of course, a version without mods:
Overhead s

And overheads by chapter and map:

Inbound = bm_c0a0a - bm_c0a0b - bm_c0a0c

Anomalous Materials = bm_c1a0a - bm_c1a0b

Unforeseen Consequences = bm_c1a1a - bm_c1a1b - bm_c1a1c - bm_c1a1d - bm_c1a1e

Office Complex = bm_c1a2a - bm_c1a2b - bm_c1a2c

We’ve Got Hostiles s / We’ve Got Hostiles u = bm_c1a3a s / bm_c1a3a u - bm_c1a3b - bm_c1a3c s / bm_c1a3c u

Blast Pit = bm_c1a4a - bm_c1a4b - bm_c1a4c - bm_c1a4d - bm_c1a4e

Power Up = bm_c2a1a - bm_c2a1b

On a Rail s / On a Rail u = bm_c2a2a s / bm_c2a2a u - bm_c2a2a1 - bm_c2a2a2 - bm_c2a2b s / bm_c2a2b u - bm_c2a2b1 - bm_c2a2b2 - bm_c2a2c s / bm_c2a2c u

Apprehension = bm_c2a3a - bm_c2a3b - bm_c2a3c

Residue Processing = bm_c2a4a - bm_c2a4b - bm_c2a4c

Questionable Ethics = bm_c2a4e - bm_c2a4f - bm_c2a4g - bm_c2a4h

Surface Tension = bm_c2a5a - bm_c2a5b - bm_c2a5c - bm_c2a5d - bm_c2a5e - bm_c2a5f - bm_c2a5g - bm_c2a5h - bm_c2a5i

Forget about Freeman = bm_c3a1a - bm_c3a1b

Lambda Core = bm_c3a2a - bm_c3a2b - bm_c3a2c - bm_c3a2d - bm_c3a2e - bm_c3a2f - bm_c3a2g - bm_c3a2h - bm_c3a2i

Deathmatch = dm_boom - dm_bounce - dm_chopper - dm_crossfire - dm_gasworks - dm_lambdabunker - dm_power - dm_rail - dm_stack - dm_stalkyard - dm_subtransit - dm_undertow
